Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
banking.TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager extends Object
Transaction Manager class that reads in transactions from the command line. Depending on the action, completes transaction or does not execute it.

  • Field Details

    • accountDatabase

      public static final AccountDatabase accountDatabase
      The Account Database holds all the Accounts.

    • df

      private static final DecimalFormat df
      Formats numbers for easy readability.

    • MONEY_MARKET_MINIMUM

      private static final double MONEY_MARKET_MINIMUM
      Represents the minimum initial deposit required to open a Money Market account. A Money Market account cannot be created if the provided balance is below this threshold.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CD_MINIMUM

      private static final double CD_MINIMUM
      Represents the minimum balance required to open or maintain a Certificate of Deposit (CD) account
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DAYS_IN_YEAR

      private static final double DAYS_IN_YEAR
      Represents the number of days in a year, typically used for calculations involving annual durations. This value is based on a standard year with 365 days.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • TEN_PERCENT

      private static final double TEN_PERCENT
      Represents the decimal value for ten percent, used to calculate a percentage or ratio. Typically employed in financial calculations or percentage adjustments throughout the system.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionManager

      public TransactionManager()

  • Method Details

    • run

      public static void run() throws IOException
      Executes the transaction manager process. This method loads account data from an external file, initializes the system, and begins a command-line interaction for processing transactions. The system continuously listens for user input and processes commands until a termination command ("Q") is received. Commands are interpreted and executed in real-time.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue accessing or reading the account file.

    • createBranch

      public static Branch createBranch(String branchName)
      Creates a Branch object from a provided String representation of the branch. Throws exception if the Branch name provided is invalid.
      Parameters:
      branchName - String representation of the Branch where the Account was opened
      Returns:
      Branch of the Account

    • createDate

      public static Date createDate(String date)
      Creates a Date object based on String representation of the date. Date of birth formatted as such: ##/##/####
      Parameters:
      date - String representation of the date
      Returns:
      Date object that represents the date of birth

    • createAccount

      public static Account createAccount(String[] commandArray, String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth, Branch branch, double balance)
      Creates an Account object based on provided parameters. Delegates to the getAccount method to initialize and return the appropriate Account instance.
      Parameters:
      commandArray - an array of Strings containing command details, where the account type is specified as the second element
      firstName - the first name of the account holder
      lastName - the last name of the account holder
      dateOfBirth - a Date object representing the birthdate of the account holder
      branch - the Branch object representing the bank branch where the account is opened
      balance - the initial balance for the account
      Returns:
      the created Account object

    • createAccount

      public static Account createAccount(String[] commandArray)
      Creates a new account using the provided command array.
      Parameters:
      commandArray - an array of strings containing account details in the following order: 1. Account type 2. Branch identifier 3. First name of the account holder 4. Last name of the account holder 5. Date of birth of the account holder (formatted as a string) 6. Initial deposit amount
      Returns:
      an Account object representing the newly created account

    • processActivities

      private static void processActivities() throws IOException
      Processes account activities from the file "activities.txt".

      This method reads the account activity data contained in the "activities.txt" file and processes it using the accountDatabase's processActivities method. It outputs log messages to the console indicating the start and completion of activity processing.

      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while processing the file.

    • printAccounts

      private static void printAccounts(String command)
      Determines which type of print command is needed and prints the Accounts in a certain order. VALID COMMANDS: P, PA ,PB, PH, PT. P --> prints the AccountDatabase PA --> prints the Archive PB --> prints ordered by Branch (county, then city) PH --> prints by holder then AccountNumber PT --> prints by AccountType then AccountNumber
      Parameters:
      command - 1-2 letter String command to determine what action to take

    • isValidCommand

      private static boolean isValidCommand(String command)
      Determines if the command provided is valid. VALID COMMANDS: O, C, D, W, P, PA, PB, PH, PT. Otherwise, will identify that the command was invalid.
      Parameters:
      command - 1-2 letter String command to determine what action to take
      Returns:
      true if the command is recognized and can be executed false otherwise

    • openAccount

      private static void openAccount(String[] commandArray)
      Executed to open a new Account when the first command is "O". Checks for valid inputs including a valid AccountType, Branch, Date, and balance. Checks for duplicate account, minimum balance, and money market specifications. Adds the opened account to the database.
      Parameters:
      commandArray - Holds the input that has been extracted and put into a String array

    • checkDateOfBirth

      private static boolean checkDateOfBirth(AccountType accountType, Date dob)
      Checks a Date object to see if it is a valid date. Returns false if not a valid calendar date, if the birthdate provided is after the current date, or if the birthdate provided indicates that the person is 18 years old.
      Parameters:
      accountType - AccountType object which represents the type of Account
      dob - Date object which represents the date of birth
      Returns:
      true if valid date of birth false otherwise

    • checkBalance

      private static boolean checkBalance(double balance, AccountType acctType)
      Checks if balance of the Account being opened is valid. A starting balance of 0 or less is invalid. A Money Market Account with less than 2000 is invalid.
      Parameters:
      balance - value of money stored in Account being opened
      acctType - type of Account being opened
      Returns:
      true if balance is a valid amount false otherwise

    • closeAccount

      private static void closeAccount(String[] commandArray)
      Executed to close an exiting Account when the first command is "C". Closes an Account by removing it from the AccountDatabase and adding it to the Archive. Accounts for two different types of formatting in closing an Account: C accountNumber or C firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth
      Parameters:
      commandArray - Holds the input that has been extracted and put into a String array

    • closeSingleAccount

      private static void closeSingleAccount(AccountNumber accountNumber, Date closeDate)
      Closes a single account with the given account number and close date.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - the account number of the account to be closed
      closeDate - the date on which the account is being closed

    • closeMultipleAccounts

      private static void closeMultipleAccounts(String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth, Date closeDate)
      Closes all accounts associated with a specified account holder and logs the closure process.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the account holder whose accounts are to be closed
      lastName - the last name of the account holder whose accounts are to be closed
      dateOfBirth - the date of birth of the account holder
      closeDate - the date on which the accounts are being closed

    • findAllAccounts

      private static List<Account> findAllAccounts(Profile holder)
      Retrieves a list of all accounts associated with the specified profile holder.
      Parameters:
      holder - the profile holder whose accounts need to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of accounts associated with the provided profile holder

    • printInterest

      private static void printInterest(Account account, Date closeDate)
      Prints the interest earned on the given account based on its type, interest rate, balance, and the provided close date. It handles penalties for certificates of deposit if closed early.
      Parameters:
      account - The account for which the interest is to be calculated and printed.
      closeDate - The date on which the account is being evaluated or closed.

    • depositMoney

      private static void depositMoney(String[] commandArray)
      Executed to deposit money to an existing Account when the first command is "D". Checks for a deposit amount less than or equal to 0. Formatting of input: D accountNumber, depositAmount
      Parameters:
      commandArray - Holds the input that has been extracted and put into a String array

    • withdrawMoney

      private static void withdrawMoney(String[] commandArray)
      Executed to deposit money to an existing Account when the first command is "W". Checks for a withdrawal amount less than or equal to 0. Additionally, checks if the Account has sufficient funds or needs to be downgraded from a money market account to a savings account. Formatting of input: W accountNumber, withdrawalAmount
      Parameters:
      commandArray - Holds the input that has been extracted and put into a String array

    • createAccountType

      private static AccountType createAccountType(String type)
      Creates an AccountType object using a provided String representation of the three types of Accounts. Types of accounts: Checking(01), Savings(02), Money Market(03).
      Parameters:
      type - String representation of the type of Account
      Returns:
      AccountType of the Account

    • createProfile

      private static Profile createProfile(String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth)
      Creates a Profile object based on first name, last name, and dateOfBirth. Creates a new Profile object.
      Parameters:
      firstName - String representation of first name of Account holder
      lastName - String representation of last name of Account holder
      dateOfBirth - Date object that represents date of birth of Account holder
      Returns:
      Profile for the Account

    • getAccount

      private static Account getAccount(String[] commandArray, String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth, Branch branch, String accountType, double balance)
      Creates and returns an Account object based on the provided parameters. Determines the account type, creates a profile for the holder, and initializes the appropriate Account subtype with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      commandArray - an array of Strings containing command details, where some commands are used to specify additional account attributes such as campus code or term length
      firstName - the first name of the account holder
      lastName - the last name of the account holder
      dateOfBirth - a Date object representing the birthdate of the account holder
      branch - the Branch object representing the bank branch where the account is opened
      accountType - a String representation of the type of account to create
      balance - the initial balance to set for the account
      Returns:
      the created Account object, initialized based on the provided parameters
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the provided accountType is not a valid account type

    • processCommand

      private static void processCommand(String[] commandArray) throws IOException
      Chooses which action to complete depending on a single input line that has been read. VALID COMMANDS: O, C, D, W, P, PA, PB, PH, PT Otherwise, will identify that the command was invalid. O --> opens a new Account, if not already there C --> closes an Account, if in the database D --> deposits money into an Account, if in the database W --> withdraws money from an Account, if in the database and money available P --> prints the AccountDatabase PA --> prints the Archive PB --> prints ordered by Branch (county, then city) PH --> prints by holder then AccountNumber PT --> prints by AccountType then AccountNumber
      Parameters:
      commandArray - Holds the input that has been extracted and put into a String array
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during command processing
